name: Coco Run
description:
CocoRun is a side-scrolling platformer and arcade game. Coco has to run for his life while dodging multiple obstacles and rescue his friends. Jump, dash and eat bananas in this crazy game!

This game was made for a Game JAM in ENTI-UB, it was done in 3 days by a group of 2 programmers and 2 artists.

The themes were: Dead by a coconut and The World Ends in XX minutes YY seconds.

Controls:

  • Up arrow: Jump
  • Up arrow in the air: Double Jump
  • Right arrow: Dash

Rules:

  • If the time dawns to 0 or you crash into something, game over.
  • Take yellow bananas to obtain more time, if you take a rotten banana you loose it.
